languages.text: {n}Стоит человеку замереть навечно, как тягостная атмосфера вокруг ваc сгущается, превращаясь в буквальный мрак. Один за другим, в нем начинают появляться пылающие щели — быть может, глаза, а может, и пасти, готовые пожрать заявивш{mf|его|ую} свои права на него смертн{mf|ого|ую}. Чужая потусторонняя воля бьет в вас — и рассыпается, столкнувшись с теми силами, что оберегают вас для служения Темным богам.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Мешок плоти, скрип твоих костей о слизистые мембраны твоего мерзкого естества меня забавляет и оскорбляет одновременно! Чего ты хочешь, и почему твои кожистые придатки не содрогаются при виде моего совершенного кованого лика?"

languages.text: {n}As soon as he stills forever, the oppressive atmosphere around you deepens into literal darkness. One by one, flaming slits begin to appear in the gloom — perhaps eyes, perhaps mouths, ready to devour the mortal who has laid claim to it. A foreign, otherworldly will rails against you — and crumbles when confronted by the forces that keep you safe in the service of the Dark Gods.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Стоит человеку замереть навечно, как тягостная атмосфера вокруг ваc сгущается, превращаясь в буквальный мрак. Один за другим, в нем начинают появляться пылающие щели — быть может, глаза, а может, и пасти, готовые пожрать заявивш{mf|его|ую} свои права на него смертн{mf|ого|ую}. Чужая потусторонняя воля бьет в вас — и рассыпается, столкнувшись с теми силами, что оберегают вас для служения Темным богам.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}As soon as he stills forever, the oppressive atmosphere around you deepens into literal darkness. One by one, flaming slits begin to appear in the gloom — perhaps eyes, perhaps mouths, ready to devour the mortal who has laid claim to it. A foreign, otherworldly will rails against you — and crumbles when confronted by the forces that keep you safe in the service of the dark gods.{/n}

"Flesh-bag, the creaking of your bones against the slimy membranes of your revolting substance both amuses and offends me! What do you want, and why are your leathery outgrowths not trembling at the sight of me, a perfection in steel?"

{n}As soon as he stills forever, the oppressive atmosphere around you deepens into literal darkness. One by one, flaming slits begin to appear in the gloom — perhaps eyes, perhaps mouths, ready to devour the mortal who has laid claim to it. A foreign, otherworldly will rails against you — and crumbles when confronted by the forces that keep you safe in the service of the dark gods.{/n}

"Flesh-bag, the creaking of your bones against the slimy membranes of your revolting substance both amuses and offends me! What do you want, and why are your leathery outgrowths not trembling at the sight of my perfection in steel form?"

{n}As soon as he stills forever, the oppressive atmosphere around you deepens into literal darkness. One by one, flaming slits begin to appear in the gloom — perhaps eyes, perhaps mouths, ready to devour the mortal who has laid claim to it. A foreign, otherworldly will rails against you — and crumbles when confronted by the forces that keep you safe in the service of the dark gods.{/n}

{n}As soon as he stills forever, the oppressive atmosphere around you deepens into literal darkness. One by one, flaming slits begin to appear in the gloom — perhaps eyes, perhaps mouths, ready to devour the mortal who has laid claim to it. A foreign, otherworldly will rails against you — and crumbles when confronted by the forces that keep you safe in the service of the dark gods.{/n}

languages.text: {n}彼が永遠に動きを止めると同時に、あなたを取り巻く重苦しい空気が文字通りの闇へと深まっていった。暗闇の中に炎のような裂け目が1つ、また1つと現れる。それは目であるかもしれず、今まさにあなたを貪り食わんとする口であるかもしれない。異質な、この世のものとは思えぬ意志があなたに向かって襲いかかり…暗黒神に仕えるあなたの身を守る力の前に崩れ去った。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As soon as he stills forever, the oppressive atmosphere around you deepens into literal darkness. One by one, flaming slits begin to appear in the gloom — perhaps eyes, perhaps mouths, ready to devour the mortal who has laid claim to it. A foreign, otherworldly will rails against you — and crumbles when confronted by the forces that keep you safe in the service of the Dark Gods.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}彼が永遠に動きを止めると同時に、あなたを取り巻く重苦しい空気が文字通りの闇へと深まっていった。暗闇の中に炎のような裂け目が1つ、また1つと現れる。それは目であるかもしれず、今まさにあなたを貪り食わんとする口であるかもしれない。異質な、この世のものとは思えぬ意志があなたに向かって襲いかかり…暗黒神に仕えるあなたの身を守る力の前に崩れ去った。{/n}

languages.text: {n}À l'instant où il s'immobilise à jamais, l'atmosphère oppressante s'épaissit pour laisser place à des ténèbres insondables. Une par une, des fentes enflammées apparaissent dans la pénombre, comme autant d'yeux ou de bouches prêtes à dévorer {mf|le mortel|la mortelle} qui a osé empiéter sur leur territoire. Une volonté étrangère, surnaturelle, se dresse contre vous... et cède rapidement devant les forces qui veillent sur vous au service des Dieux Sombres.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As soon as he stills forever, the oppressive atmosphere around you deepens into literal darkness. One by one, flaming slits begin to appear in the gloom — perhaps eyes, perhaps mouths, ready to devour the mortal who has laid claim to it. A foreign, otherworldly will rails against you — and crumbles when confronted by the forces that keep you safe in the service of the Dark Gods.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Sac de viande, le grincement de vos os contre les membranes gluantes de votre immonde corps m'amuse autant qu'il m'agace ! Que voulez-vous, et pourquoi vos excroissances dermiques ne tremblent pas à la vue de ma perfection métallique ? »

languages.text: {n}当他陷入沉寂之后，你周围阴暗的气息变成了真正的黑暗。黑暗之中浮现出一条条熊熊燃烧的裂口，或许是眼睛，又或许是嘴巴，随时打算吞噬那个自称主人的凡人。某个来自另一个世界的意志试图反抗你的意愿，然而，当这个意志面对着你的守护者——黑暗诸神的力量时，它便开始分崩离析。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As soon as he stills forever, the oppressive atmosphere around you deepens into literal darkness. One by one, flaming slits begin to appear in the gloom — perhaps eyes, perhaps mouths, ready to devour the mortal who has laid claim to it. A foreign, otherworldly will rails against you — and crumbles when confronted by the forces that keep you safe in the service of the Dark Gods.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “你这肉袋！你的骨头与令人作呕的黏膜摩擦时发出的咯吱声，让我感觉既有趣、又恶心！你想要什么？还有，你明明是具凡胎肉身，可为什么你见到我这完美的钢铁之躯时，却丝毫没有颤抖？”

languages.text: {n}En cuanto calla para siempre, la atmósfera opresora que os rodea se intensifica, creando una oscuridad literal. Una tras otra, ranuras ardientes se abren en la penumbra. Pueden ser bocas u ojos, dispuestos a devorar al mortal que quería adueñarse de ella. Una voluntad ajena y sobrenatural se abalanza contra ti... y se desmorona al enfrentarse a los poderes que te protegen al servicio de los Dioses Oscuros.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As soon as he stills forever, the oppressive atmosphere around you deepens into literal darkness. One by one, flaming slits begin to appear in the gloom — perhaps eyes, perhaps mouths, ready to devour the mortal who has laid claim to it. A foreign, otherworldly will rails against you — and crumbles when confronted by the forces that keep you safe in the service of the Dark Gods.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Saco de carne, ¡el crujido de tus huesos contra las membranas viscosas de esa asquerosidad que tienes por cuerpo me divierte y me ofende al mismo tiempo! ¿Qué quieres y por qué no tiemblan tus coriáceas excrecencias ante mi férrea perfección?».

languages.text: {n}Als er für immer verstummt, verdichtet sich die drückende Atmosphäre um dich herum zu einer undurchdringlichen Dunkelheit. Schließlich erscheinen in der Finsternis feurige Schlitze ... Augen oder Münder, die bereit sind, den Sterblichen zu verschlingen, der Anspruch auf sie erhoben hatte. Ein fremder, andersweltlicher Wille brandet dir entgegen ... und vergeht, als er auf die Mächte prallt, die im Namen der dunklen Götter für deine Sicherheit sorgen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As soon as he stills forever, the oppressive atmosphere around you deepens into literal darkness. One by one, flaming slits begin to appear in the gloom — perhaps eyes, perhaps mouths, ready to devour the mortal who has laid claim to it. A foreign, otherworldly will rails against you — and crumbles when confronted by the forces that keep you safe in the service of the Dark Gods.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Fleischsack, wie Eure Knochen gegen die schleimigen Membranen Eurer widerwärtigen Substanz reiben, das amüsiert und beleidigt mich! Was wollt Ihr, und warum erzittern Eure ledrigen Auswüchse nicht ob des Anblicks meiner Perfektion in Stahlform?"

languages.text: {n}Yaratık ölür ölmez etrafındaki baskın hava karanlıkta kayboluyor. Loş ortamda ardı ardına alevli kesikler beliriyor. Üzerinde hak iddia eden fâniyi yutacak ağızlar, belki de gözler. Başka bir dünyadan yabancı bir irade sana karşı geliyor. Kara tanrıların hizmetindeki, seni koruyan güçlerle karşılaştığındaysa ufalanıp gidiyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As soon as he stills forever, the oppressive atmosphere around you deepens into literal darkness. One by one, flaming slits begin to appear in the gloom — perhaps eyes, perhaps mouths, ready to devour the mortal who has laid claim to it. A foreign, otherworldly will rails against you — and crumbles when confronted by the forces that keep you safe in the service of the Dark Gods.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ölür ölmez, etrafındaki baskın atmosfer karanlıkta kayboluyor. Loş ortamda ardı ardına alevli kesikler beliriyor. Üzerinde hak iddia eden fâniyi yutacak ağızlar, belki de gözler. Başka bir dünyadan, yabancı bir irade sana karşı geliyor. Kara tanrıların hizmetindeki seni koruyan güçlerle karşılaştığındaysa ufalanıp gidiyor.{/n}
